ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Animations/Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: grats on the hate items! i see weird animations as well with it, but after the first pulse i go to no animation at all other than normal running.  with SSoT i
ygData.messageBody:
grats on the hate items!

i see weird animations as well with it, but after the first pulse i go to no
animation at all other than normal running. with SSoT i do not get the
waddle i get with normal Selo's. i think the weird SSoT animations come
after i zone, or on the first pulse only.

Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

> Hail and Well Met,
>
> I am wondering if anyone that has the Selo's Song of Travel
> has noticed the
> animation acting funny. To me, it looks as if the animatioon
> for the silly
> waddle and the arm waving are trying to go off at the same
> time, resulting
> in my character leaning hard to one side sometimes or
> waddling erratically.
> Is it just me?
>
> I finally went to my first plane Sunday.
